title: Can we have 5.0 kog back yet?
body: Everything else is allowed it be blatantly and disgustingly overpowered, can we give my boy kog some love?

replies.body:
You know what, go for it... if other onhit champs are allowed to abuse {{item:3161}}({{champion:11}} {{champion:24}} ) Let kog abuse something of his own.

Right now, onhit is so weak on kogmaw that I would prefer to even go full ap.
I liked the reworked Kog. Shame they had to revert it.
